channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Walloon Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Walloon Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Parti du Travail de Belgique: 12–15 seats
  • Parti Socialiste: 18–23 seats
  • Les Engagés: 15–19 seats
  • Chez Nous: 0–2 seats
  • DéFI: 0 seats
  • Mouvement Réformateur: 19–22 seats
  • Ecolo: 1–5 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Parti du Travail de Belgique: 15.1–18.4%
  • Parti Socialiste: 22.5–26.2%
  • Les Engagés: 18.3–21.8%
  • Chez Nous: 2.5–4.0%
  • DéFI: 2.3–3.9%
  • Mouvement Réformateur: 22.1–25.9%
  • Ecolo: 5.6–7.8%
